title: Cif Infinite Clean Lime & Lemongrass All in One Cleaner Spray with probiotics technology for a long-lasting clean* 590 ml
features: Cif Infinite Clean Lime & Lemongrass All in One Cleaner works throughout your home and beyond, cleaning hard surfaces and refreshing soft furnishings
Experience Unmatched Versatility: From greasy kitchen hobs and dirty tiles to dusty bookshelves and smudgy glass tables, this multi surface cleaner handles it all
Lime & Lemongrass Fragrance: Our cleaning spray leaves the house smelling clean and fresh with its invigorating continuous mist, making your home not just clean but also fragrant
Safe for All: This cleaner spray is suitable for areas around kids*** and pets**
Long-Lasting Clean*: This cleaner spray is powered by probiotic technology that continues to clean for up to 3 days, even after you stop
Cif Infinite Clean comes with a reusable spray device – just add your cleaner spray device onto a new reload pack and spray away
description: Product Description Cif Infinite Lime & Lemongrass All in One Cleaner Spray is your ultimate cleaning companion, designed to work throughout your home and beyond. From greasy kitchen hobs and dirty tiles to dusty bookshelves and smudgy glass tables, this all in one cleaner handles it all. It’s also perfect for cleaning bikes, mirrors, speakers, taps, garden equipment, clocks, electronic devices, bins, and refreshing rugs. Experience unmatched versatility in your cleaning routine! This all purpose cleaner features a continuous mist spray, making cleaning quick and easy. Simply Spray+Wipe+Enjoy! For soft furnishings, just spray and enjoy the freshness. Cif Infinite Clean’s gentle yet effective formula is suitable to use on areas around kids*** and pets**, making it suitable for all areas of your home. Cif Infinite Clean comes with a reusable spray device – just add your spray device onto a new reload pack and spray away. The spray device also comes with a 3-year guaranteeⵜ. Each spray not only cleans but also leaves a delightful Lime & Lemongrass fragrance, providing long-lasting freshness^^^. Powered with probiotics technology, Cif Infinite Clean keeps on cleaning* even when you stop. The probiotics continue to break down dirt and grime for up to 3 days, ensuring your home stays cleaner for longer* with minimal effort. *Probiotics will keep on working for up to 3 days on hard surfaces. **Cats and dogs. ***Hard surfaces like toys and highchairs. ^Suitable for a range of hard surfaces. ^^For soft furnishings: Spray+Enjoy. ^^^For up to 8 hours. ⵜFor more information about warranty, please see ‘Other Technical Information’ document. Ingredients <5% Non ionic surfactant Phenoxyethanol Perfume, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil. Other Ingredient : Probiotics Manufacturer Contact Information Unilever UK Ltd, Springfied Drive, Leatherhead, KT22 7GR. Unilever Ireland Ltd, 20 Riverwalk, Citywest, Dublin 24, Ireland. See more
